title: Ribbon, 18th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 29.3 x 9 cm (11 9/16 x 3 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Globular shapes arising from central stem in red and gold. Picot edges made by weft.

Ribbon, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk and metallic thread. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1896-1-57.
